name: Little Girls Brown Flowered Skirt and Matching Shirt
description:
I love this fabric – and your favorite girl will too! It’s perfect for fall, winter – even spring and summer!!

	We have multiple sizes available. 12-18 months thru size 7. Waist is elastic. Let us know at time of purchase which size you need!

	Feel free to email us with questions!!

	muffin and bear can custom make your next outfit – you pick the fabric and the accessories – we make it for you!!

name: Soft Baby Flannel Patchwork Quilt
description:
Why buy a store bought blanket when you can have a unique, one of a kind gift for the new baby in your life?

	Our flannel patchwork blankets are one of a kind – soft, fluffy and perfect for tummy time or as a crib blanket when they get older.

	The large size – 52”x39” makes it perfect for those older toddlers who just want something their size to snuggle with!

	Our blankets are made at the time of ordering – let us know if you want them in girl (green, pink and matching colors), boy (blue, green and matching colors) or neutral (yellow, green and matching colors).

	Feel free to email us with questions!!

	muffin and bear can custom make your next skirt or blanket – you pick the fabric and the accessories – we make it for you!!
